timeline.message:
1.16 preparation - Entities
- Added 1.16 entities
- In the lang file, gave zombie pigmen an alternate name (in 1.16 they're now zombified piglins)

1.16 preparation - Enchantments
- Add the one and only enchantment

1.16 preparation - Particles
- Add the new particles

1.16 preparation - Biomes
- Add the missing 1.14 bamboo biomes
- Add the 1.16 biomes

timeline.bodyText: missing space before the ending brace
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: Will fix this, I dont think it was my line of code, I copy/pasted from above. But I will fix it :)
replies.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText:
This is fine right now but in the future, piglins might be worth a separate entity data for their hunter state. So, passive piglin and just piglin, same goes for hoglins. Although passive might be misleading considering they would only be passive to hoglins.
Striders also have a shivering state, so that's also worth considering.
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText:
As for the Piglins, I considered it, but due to the changes in the API happening, I kinda wanted to wait til that settles, same goes for the upcoming Piglin Brute.
Im actually surprised the Strider has a shivering state, from what I could see it was client side.  (EDIT: nope, ignore me, I was thinking about something wrong there)
replies.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/SkriptLang/Skript into update/1.16-content
